page.title: 04Library and Bus Services
page.content: The Wiltshire County Mobile Library visits the area on a bi_weekly basis and is well stocked and patronized. The library also offers the facility to order particular books both fiction and non_fiction. Leaflets regarding entertainment, bus services, health etc., are also available. Collingbourne Kingston has three bus services operated commercially with one private school bus. Everleigh has one commercial plus one school service. The general public are allowed to use the school bus during term times on payment of the normal fare.
